title: Gorgonzola stuffed chicken breasts wrapped in bacon
ingredients: ['2 skinless chicken breast fillets', '4 tablespoons crumbled Gorgonzola cheese', '2 tablespoons finely chopped fresh parsley', '2 tablespoons finely chopped shallot', '1 clove garlic, finely chopped', '4 thick rashers smoked streaky bacon', 'salt and black pepper to taste']
